definitions.title: adj. girded, girt
definitions.body: (cf. Ba:NB 206)—only cstr. Pr 30:31 [[זַרְזִיר מָתְנַיִם אוֹ־תָָיִו]] that which is girt in the loins, etc., named with lion, he-goat, and king, as stately in motion. Perh.= grey-hound Ew Bö De al., or war-horse Bo Ges Hi al.; Vrss. cock, Talm. raven, v. De Now (NH [[זַרְזִיר]] starling (war-horse only in interpr. of Pr 30:31), Aram. zarziyro0; Lexx. also zarzuwro0 starling, in Ar. zurzuwrun, perh. loan-wd. Others der. fr. a √[[זרר]], v. supr.)
